name: bem-utils
description: Sugar for writing BEM-style classNames and CSS
author: Josiah Savary <hello@jsavary.com> (jsavary.com)

scripts.test: npm run -s mocha -- --reporter nyan --require mocha.config test/*.spec.js
scripts.babel: npm run -s rimraf -- lib && babel src --out-dir lib --stage 0 --optional runtime
scripts.lint: npm run -s eslint -s -- src && cat winning.txt
scripts.coverage: npm run -s istanbul -- cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --reporter nyan --require mocha.config test/*.spec.js
scripts.update-coverage: npm run -s coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | npm run -s coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
